00046 #include "physvector.h"

00048 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00049 // Constructors
00050 PhysVector3::PhysVector3()
00051 {
00052     X=0;
00053     Y=0;
00054     Z=0;
00055 }
00056 
00057 PhysVector3::PhysVector3(Real x, Real y, Real z)
00058 {
00059         X=x;
00060         Y=y;
00061         Z=z;
00062 }
00063 
00064 PhysVector3::PhysVector3(Ogre::Vector3 Vec)
00065 {
00066     this->ExtractOgreVector3(Vec);
00067 }
00068 
00069 PhysVector3::PhysVector3(btVector3 Vec)
00070 {
00071     this->ExtractBulletVector3(Vec);
00072 }
00073 
00074 /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00075 // Operators
00076 std::ostream& operator << (std::ostream& stream, const PhysVector3& x)
00077 {
00078     stream << "[" << x.X << "," << x.Y << "," << x.Z << "]";
00079     return stream;
00080 }
00081 
00082 void PhysVector3::operator= (const btVector3 &bt3)
00083 {
00084     (*this)<<bt3;
00085 }
00086 
00087 void PhysVector3::operator=(const Ogre::Vector3 &OVec3)
00088 {
00089     (*this)<<OVec3;
00090 }
00091 
00092 Ogre::Vector3& operator << (Ogre::Vector3& VecTo, const PhysVector3& VecFrom)
00093 {
00094     VecTo.x=VecFrom.X;
00095     VecTo.y=VecFrom.Y;
00096     VecTo.z=VecFrom.Z;
00097     return VecTo;
00098 }
00099 
00100 Ogre::Vector3& operator << (Ogre::Vector3& VecTo, const btVector3& VecFrom)
00101 {
00102     VecTo.x=VecFrom.getX();
00103     VecTo.y=VecFrom.getY();
00104     VecTo.z=VecFrom.getZ();
00105     return VecTo;
00106 }
00107 
00108 btVector3& operator << (btVector3& VecTo, const Ogre::Vector3& VecFrom)
00109 {
00110     VecTo.setX(VecFrom.x);
00111     VecTo.setY(VecFrom.y);
00112     VecTo.setZ(VecFrom.z);
00113     VecTo.setW(0);
00114     return VecTo;
00115 }
00116 
00117 btVector3& operator << (btVector3& VecTo, const PhysVector3& VecFrom)
00118 {
00119     VecTo.setX(VecFrom.X);
00120     VecTo.setY(VecFrom.Y);
00121     VecTo.setZ(VecFrom.Z);
00122     VecTo.setW(0);
00123     return VecTo;
00124 }
00125 
00126 PhysVector3& operator << (PhysVector3& VecTo, const Ogre::Vector3& VecFrom)
00127 {
00128     VecTo.X=VecFrom.x;
00129     VecTo.Y=VecFrom.y;
00130     VecTo.Z=VecFrom.z;
00131     return VecTo;
00132 }
00133 
00134 PhysVector3& operator << (PhysVector3& VecTo, const btVector3& VecFrom)
00135 {

00137     VecTo.Y=VecFrom.getY();
00138     VecTo.Z=VecFrom.getZ();
00139     return VecTo;

00142 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00143 // Manual Conversions
00144 btVector3 PhysVector3::GetBulletVector3() const
00145 {
00146     btVector3 Theirs;
00147     Theirs.setX(this->X);
00148     Theirs.setY(this->Y);
00149     Theirs.setZ(this->Z);
00150     Theirs.setW(0);
00151     return Theirs;
00152 }
00153 
00154 void PhysVector3::ExtractBulletVector3(btVector3 Ours)
00155 {
00156     this->X=Ours.getX();
00157     this->Y=Ours.getY();
00158     this->Z=Ours.getZ();
00159 }
00160 
00161 Ogre::Vector3 PhysVector3::GetOgreVector3() const
00162 {
00163     Ogre::Vector3 Theirs;
00164     Theirs.x=this->X;
00165     Theirs.y=this->Y;
00166     Theirs.z=this->Z;
00167     return Theirs;
00168 }
00169 
00170 void PhysVector3::ExtractOgreVector3(Ogre::Vector3 Ours)
00171 {
00172     this->X=Ours.x;
00173     this->Y=Ours.y;
00174     this->Z=Ours.z;
00175 }
